ro.top.service

Class ClientNotificationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ro.top.service.ClientNotificationController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public final class ClientNotificationController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
    The main class for client. To prevent unexpected behaviors, make sure you make the very first use of this class by calling the getInstance(String serverSocket, int clientPort) method, that fully configures the client side
    Since:
    1.8

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static ClientNotificationController getInstance(java.lang.String serverSocket,
                                                       int clientPort)
        Initialize the client and returns the singleton instance. It is highly recommended to use this method for the very first use of this class
        Parameters:
        serverSocket - socket of the Notification Server under the forma "host:port"
        clientPort - at which port should this client create its registry
        Returns:
        singleton

      • getInstance

        public static ClientNotificationController getInstance()
        Initialize the client with default configurations and returns the singleton instance. It is highly recommended to use getInstance(String serverSocket, int clientPort) method for the very first use of this class The default configurations are :
        - serverSocket : localhost:4444
        - clientSocket : local_ip_address:9999
        Returns:
        singleton

      • getInstance

        public static ClientNotificationController getInstance(java.lang.String serverSocket)
        Initialize the client with the given server socket and default client socket and returns the singleton instance. It is highly recommended to use getInstance(String serverSocket, int clientPort) method for the very first use of this class.
        Server Socket format : "host:port"
        The default configurations are : - clientSocket : this_local_ip_address:9999
        Parameters:
        serverSocket -
        Returns:
        singleton
